00150 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00151 {
00152     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00153 
00154     if ( globalThresholdingTime_.get() != 0 )
00155         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_.get();
00156 
00157     if ( templateFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00158         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_.get();
00159 
00160     if ( averagingFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00161         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_.get();
00162 
00163     if ( thinningTime_.get() != 0 )
00164         totalTime_ += *thinningTime_.get();
00165 
00166     if ( regionsExtractionTime_.get() != 0 )
00167         totalTime_ += *regionsExtractionTime_.get();
00168 
00169     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_.get() != 0 )
00170         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_.get();
00171 
00172     if ( spacesLocationFindingTime_.get() != 0 )
00173         totalTime_ += *spacesLocationFindingTime_.get();
00174 };
